snippet.title: SAGE 2018 Trailer & Demo - Sonic 3 A.I.R.
snippet.description:
Sonic 3 - Angel Island Revisited
Trailer for SAGE 2018

----------
*UPDATE*
The game is now completed with all zones from Sonic 3 and Sonic & Knuckles.

DOWNLOAD the full game from the project homepage:
https://sonic3air.org
(If you are new to Sonic 3 A.I.R., make sure to meet the requirements - you need the Sonic 3 & Knuckles Steam version.)

For UPDATES on the project follow me on Twitter - @Eukaryot3K:
https://twitter.com/Eukaryot3K
